hadiths.text: Narrated Sa`id bin Zaid bin `Amr bin Nufail:That Arwa sued him before Marwan for a right, which she claimed, he had deprived her of. On that Sa`id said, "How should I deprive her of her right? I testify that I heard Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) saying, 'If anyone takes a span of land unjustly, his neck will be encircled with it down seven earths on the Day of Resurrection

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي سَبْعِ أَرَضِينَ
chapter.eng-name: What has been said regarding the seven earths
